text: That time we got lost looking for churros at 2am.
When you explained the entire plot of a movie in the wrong order and it was somehow better.
The sunset that looked like a painting we didn't deserve.
Dancing in the kitchen to a song neither of us knew the words to.
The first time the coffee was actually perfect.
Laughing so hard we forgot what was funny.
That rainy afternoon where nothing happened and everything mattered.
Building something together just because we could.
The song that played at exactly the right moment.
Sharing a dessert that was too beautiful to eat â€” but we did anyway.
